mapper.select: SELECT BOOK_NO, USER_NO, USE_DATE, START_TIME, END_TIME, NUM_PEOPLE, FACILITY_NAME, CENTER_NAME, CENTER_FILEPATH1 FROM BOOK_TBL JOIN FACILITIES_TBL USING(FACILITY_NO) JOIN CENTER_TBL USING(CENTER_NO) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND START_TIME >= SYSDATE AND PAY_TIME IS NOT NULL ORDER BY START_TIME ASC
SELECT USE_DATE ,START_TIME ,END_TIME ,NUM_PEOPLE FROM BOOK_TBL WHERE FACILITY_NO=#{facilityNo} AND PAY_TIME IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM BOOK_TBL RIGHT JOIN USER_TBL USING(USER_NO) RIGHT JOIN POINT_TBL USING(USER_NO) LEFT JOIN FACILITIES_TBL USING(FACILITY_NO) LEFT JOIN CENTER_TBL USING(CENTER_NO) WHERE BOOK_NO=#{bookNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK_TBL VALUES(#{bookNo}, #{facilityNo}, #{userNo}, #{useDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{bookPrice}, #{numPeople}, NULL, NULL)
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK_TBL SET PAY_TIME=SYSTIMESTAMP, PAID_PRICE=#{paidPrice} WHERE BOOK_NO = #{bookNo}
